typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	TableName as string
}
source(output(
		REP_BETRAG as double,
		REP_FIBLFDNR_H as double,
		REP_FIBLFDNR_S as double,
		REP_ID as double,
		REP_KZ as timestamp,
		REP_LDATE as timestamp,
		REP_MANID as double,
		REP_MAS_DOWID as double,
		REP_MENGE as double,
		REP_RABATT1 as double,
		REP_RECID as double,
		REP_SH as string,
		REP_USEID as double,
		REP_ABLDAT as timestamp,
		REP_ABLID as double,
		REP_ABRBIS as timestamp,
		REP_ABRVON as timestamp,
		REP_BEZ as string,
		REP_AUF_DPCID_H as string,
		REP_KST_DPCID_H as string,
		REP_PC_DPCID_H as string,
		REP_PSP_DPCID_H as string,
		REP_AUF_DPCID_S as string,
		REP_KST_DPCID_S as string,
		REP_PC_DPCID_S as string,
		REP_PSP_DPCID_S as string,
		REP_EINGABEREQ as string,
		REP_FIBLFDNR_H_MWST as double,
		REP_FIBLFDNR_S_MWST as double,
		REP_FIBU_PRSID as double,
		REP_FIXIERT as string,
		REP_FREIVERBR as double,
		REP_FREMD_BETRAG as double,
		REP_FREMD_WAEID as double,
		REP_GERID as double,
		REP_KONSTANTE as double,
		REP_MENGERECH as string,
		REP_MULTIPLIKATOR as double,
		REP_NORMFAKTOR as double,
		REP_SORTNR as double,
		REP_STAND as double,
		REP_STORNOFLAG_OLD as string,
		REP_TARID as double,
		REP_UEBID as double,
		REP_URMENGE as double,
		REP_VABLDAT as timestamp,
		REP_VKNID as double,
		REP_VSTAND as double,
		REP_GRUPPEN_REPID as double,
		REP_NOFMAS_DOWID as double,
		REP_BIMID as double,
		REP_KTPID as double,
		REP_MECID as double,
		REP_TCOID as double,
		REP_PTYID as double,
		REP_FREMDNR as string,
		REP_POSTYPE as string,
		REP_CDEID as double,
		REP_VETID as double,
		REP_DET_INTID as double,
		REP_NETTO as double,
		REP_FREMD_NETTO as double,
		REP_UR_MAS_DOWID as double,
		REP_AMOUNTUNITCODE as decimal(38,18),
		REP_DURATION as double,
		REP_DURATIONUNITCODE as decimal(38,18),
		REP_ARTID as double,
		REP_REFERENCE as string,
		REP_TAPIDENTIFIER as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StagedParquet
StagedParquet sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'SD_RECHNUNGSPOS[n]',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 20),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DataExtractionSinkAvro
